name: Planetary Pelter (2DShooter Final)
description:
Modifications:

1. Added 3 unique levels. The third especially is challenging and requires use of strategy and understanding of game navigation (40 Enemies).

2. Added unique enemy, which looks like a square space station which fires out of all four corners of the enemy.

3. Added planetary obstacles (giving the game its name). These planets are large and limit the navigation of the player, but add another element of challenge.

Credits:

Created by Jackson Tatge

(NOTE: Yet again, I have been attempting to build the WebGL version, but on every attempt Unity freezes and crashes. I have followed instructions perfectly and watched multiple help videos but nothing has worked quite yet. Hopefully the Windows and MacOS versions are enough for full credit, I don't know at all what is causing the problem)
